item.title: Terraform Best Practices
item.description: These are the opinionated best-practices we follow at Cloud Posse. They are inspired by years of experience writing terraform and borrow on the many other helpful resources like those by HashiCorp. See our general Best Practices which also apply to Terraform. Language Use indented HEREDOC syntax Using <<-EOT (as opposed to <<EOT without the -) ensures the code can be indented inline with the other code in the project. Note that EOT can be any uppercase string (e.
